scripts.build: yarn workspace @uifabric-vue/utilities build && yarn workspace @uifabric-vue/office-ui-fabric-vue build
scripts.ghpages: yarn workspace api-docs build && cd ./packages/api-docs/dist && git init && git add -A && git commit -m 'deploy' && git push -f https://github.com/johannes-z/office-fabric master:gh-pages
